open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

updates.content: A power outage at the Humansdorp node is causing degraded performance. Technicians are en-route with a generator.

closed.title: Vodacom Outage | Cape Town
closed.description: We are investigating reports of limited to no connectivity affecting clients on the Vodacom network in Cape Town. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

closed.title: Vodacom Outage | Eastern & Western Cape
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Vodacom network in the Eastern and Western Cape. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: The service disruption has been found to be caused by faulty hardware that needs to be replaced. Vodacom has scheduled an emergency change has been scheduled for 10/23/2025 at 11:00:00 PM  till 10/24/2025 at 5:00:00 AM to restore service. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.
